title: MG 2.0: JSW MG Motor India sets wheels rolling to give India another 'Maruti moment'
description: JSW Group and SAIC Motor-owned MG Motor India announced a joint venture to produce electric and internal combustion engine cars in India. With JSW's 35% stake acquisition, the partnership aims to challenge Maruti and Tata Motors' dominance in Indian markets. MG plans to capture a third of the New Energy vehicle market by 2030, focusing on EVs.
